availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jacob B. Briscoe (Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer and magistrate.)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer and magistrate. Kentucky, native. Son of Henry Briscoe and Catherine Brookhart Briscoe. Married to Elizabeth Etley Briscoe in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 18, 1832. Married to Magdelena Etley Briscoe in Jefferson County on November 2, 1836. Father of E.J. Briscoe, Sally Ann Briscoe Winand, Mary M. Briscoe Ford, Joseph Franklin Briscoe, Richard Anderson Briscoe, and William Harry Briscoe. Cooper in Jefferson County in 1850. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1860. Magistrate in Jefferson County from 1861 to 1884.

ab.bibl:
